name: Fleet Logistics
text: During each of your turns of the action phase, after you perform an action, you may perform an additional tactical action.

name: Neural Motivator
text: At the end of your turn, you may exhaust this card to draw 1 action card.

name: Dacxive Animators
text:
After 1 of your ground forces is destroyed during ground combat, you may place that unit on this card.
At the end of your turn, you may exhaust this card to place any number of units from it onto a planet you control.

name: Hyper Metabolism
text: At the end of your turn, you may exhaust this card to gain 1 command token.

name: X-89 Bacterial Weapon
text: After 1 or more of your units use BOMBARDMENT against a planet, if at least 1 hit was produced, you may exhaust this card; if you do, destroy all other player's ground forces on that planet.

name: Sarween Tools
text: When you produce 1 or more units, reduce the combined cost of the produced units by 1.

name: Graviton Laser System
text:
You may exhaust this card before 1 or more of your units use SPACE CANNON; hits produced by those units must be assigned to non-fighter ships if able.
You may exhaust this card at the start of a space combat round; hits produced by your units this round must be assigned to non-fighter ships if able.

name: Integrated Economy
text: After you gain control of a planet, you may produce any number of units on that planet that have a combined cost equal or less than the sum of that planet's resource and influence values.

name: Plasma Scoring
text: When 1 or more of your units make a roll for a unit ability, you may choose 1 of those units to roll 1 additional die.

name: Magen Defense Grid
text: You may exhaust this card at the start of a round of ground combat on a planet you control; your opponent cannot make combat rolls during this combat round.

name: Duranium Armor
text: During each combat round, after you assign hits to your units, repair 1 of your participating damaged units that did not use SUSTAIN DAMAGE during this combat round.

name: Space Dock II
text:
PRODUCTION X
This unit's PRODUCTION value is equal to 5 more than the resource value of this planet.
Up to 5 fighters in this system do not count against your ships' capacity.
When you use this unit's PRODUCTION ability, you may place the produced units on any planet in this system.

name: Infantry II
text:
Cost: 1(x2), Combat 7
When you gain control of a planet, if you have more infantry on that planet than that planet's resource value, gain that planet readied.

name: Fighter II
text:
Cost: 1(x2), Combat 8, Move 2
This unit may move without being transported. Fighters in excess of your ships' capacity count against your fleet pool.

name: Cruiser II
text:
Cost 2, Combat 6, Move 3, Capacity 1
When making a combat roll for this ship, each result of 9 or 10, before applying modifiers, produces 1 additional hit.

name: Carrier II
text: Cost 3, Combat 9, Move 2, Capacity 6

name: Dreadnought II
text:
Cost 4, Combat 4, Move 2, Capacity 1
SUSTAIN DAMAGE, BOMBARDMENT 4

name: War Sun
text:
Cost 12, Combat 3(x3), Move 2, Capacity 6
SUSTAIN DAMAGE, BOMBARDMENT 3(x3)
Other player's units in this system lose PLANETARY SHIELD.

name: Production Biomes
text: Exhaust this card to gain 3 trade goods and choose 1 other player; that player gains 2 trade goods.

name: Advanced Carrier II
text:
Cost 3, Combat 9, Move 2, Capacity 8
SUSTAIN DAMAGE

name: Spec Ops II
text:
Cost: 1(x2), Combat 6
When you gain control of a planet, if you have more infantry on that planet than that planet's resource or influence value, gain that planet readied.

name: L4 Disruptors
text: During an invasion, units cannot use SPACE CANNON against your units.

name: Instinct Training
text: You may exhaust this card when another player plays an action card; cancel that action card.

name: E-Res Siphons
text: After another player activates a system that contains 1 or more of your ships, gain 2 trade goods.

name: Valkyrie Particle Weave
text: After making combat rolls during a round of ground combat, if your opponent produced 1 or more hits, you produce 1 additional hit.

name: Exotrireme II
text:
Cost 4, Combat 4, Move 2, Capacity 1
SUSTAIN DAMAGE, BOMBARDMENT 3(x2)
After a round of space combat, you may destroy this unit to destroy up to 2 ships in this system.

name: Inheritance Systems
text: You may exhaust this card when you research a technology; ignore all of that technology's prerequisites.

name: Super-Dreadnought II
text:
Cost 4, Combat 3, Move 2, Capacity 2
SUSTAIN DAMAGE, BOMBARDMENT 3

name: Hybrid Crystal Fighter II
text:
Cost: 1(x2), Combat 7, Move 2
This unit may move without being transported.
Fighters in excess of your ships' capacity count as 1/2 of a ship against your fleet pool.

name: Lazax Gate Folding
text:
During your tactical actions, treat the Mecatol Rex system as if it contains each non-delta wormhole.
ACTION: If you control Mecatol Rex, exhaust this card to place 1 infantry from your reinforcements on Mecatol Rex.

name: Hegemonic Trade Policy
text: Exhaust this card when 1 or more of your units use PRODUCTION; swap the resource and influence values of 1 planet you control during that use of PRODUCTION.

name: Magmus Reactor
text:
Your ships can move into supernovas.
After you place 1 or more units in a system that either contains a war sun or is adjacent to a supernova, gain 1 trade good.

name: Prototype Warsun II
text:
Cost 10, Combat 3(x3), Move 3, Capacity 6
SUSTAIN DAMAGE, BOMBARDMENT 3(x3)
Other player's units in this system lose PLANETARY SHIELD.

name: Yin Spinner
text: After you produce units, place up to 2 infantry from your reinforcements on any planet you control or in any space area that contains 1 or more of your ships.

name: Impulse Core
text: At the start of a space combat, you may destroy 1 of your cruisers or destroyers in the active system to produce 1 hit and assign it to 1 of your opponent's ships.

name: Chaos Mapping
text:
Other players cannot move ships into asteroid fields that contain 1 or more of your ships.
At the start of your turn during the action phase, you may produce 1 unit in a system that contains at least 1 of your units that has PRODUCTION.

name: Floating Factory II
text:
Move 2, Capacity 6
PRODUCTION 7
This unit is placed in the space area instead of on a planet.
This unit can move and retreat as if it were a ship.
If this unit is blockaded, it is destroyed.

name: Wormhole Generator
text: ACTION: Exhaust this card to place or move a Creuss wormhole token into either a system that contains a planet you control or a non-home system that does not contain another player's ships.

name: Bioplasmosis
text: ACTION: You may exhaust this card to remove any number of ground forces from planets you control and place them on 1 or more planets you control in the same or adjacent systems.

name: Letani Warrior II
text:
Cost: 1(x2), Combat 7
PRODUCTION 2
When you gain control of a planet, if you have more infantry on that planet than that planet's resource value, gain that planet readied.
